fields.Title: TRIBUNAL / I GOT TO KNOW THE HANGED MAN
fields.Description: "Look, I've gotten to know the hanged man too a bit over the course of this investigation..."

fields.Title: You: ""Who are you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who are you?"

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "As he moves, the interlocking piece..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As he moves, the interlocking pieces of his armour click, softly.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Fuck do you mean *talker*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck do you mean *talker*?"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Oh yeah, he would have commanded t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah, he would have commanded this fuck-hell way better than I did. But that didn't happen, because Hayseed Bill and Kipty the Kipt here..." he points to Titus and Eugene.

fields.Title: Alain: ""Listen, man. We told you we...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, man. We told you we..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Okay, yes. Immediate failure. Thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, yes. Immediate failure. Things are worse now. He's observing your every motion carefully...

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes. This will be good. It will cal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. This will be good. It will calm him down and won't cost any more lives. Lives that could be spared.

fields.Title: You: ""His parents left him in a fucking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His parents left him in a fucking leaf compactor."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You lost him. Quick!"
fields.Dialogue Text: You lost him. Quick!

fields.Title: You: ""Banaital, '41... that really happe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Banaital, '41... that really happened didn't it?"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""It was creepy, but bitches... bitc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was creepy, but bitches... bitches like that shit, I guess. Or... I don't know what bitches like. I just know how to mow down *cloths*."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Shush..." He squints at her. "Bloo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shush..." He squints at her. "Blood's all gone out now. Not long to go till the rattle starts. One down, girl -- seven to go..."
fields.Alternate1: "Shush, sister..." He squints at her. "Blood's all gone out now. Not long to go till the rattle starts. One down, girl -- six to go..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "No -- probably foster brothers! Ell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No -- probably foster brothers! Ellis was put into a foster home, remember...

fields.Title: De Paule: ""It's a mind-fuck, Korty. He wasn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a mind-fuck, Korty. He wasn't put it a leaf compactor. They're making it up to fuck with us." She glances at him. "Major, permission to..."

fields.Title: Logic: "Uhm... this might be a *very* bad m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Uhm... this might be a *very* bad moment to come up with this, but he's *Korty* right?

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Sergeant Major Raul Kortenaer -- r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sergeant Major Raul Kortenaer -- reporting in to burn this fucking mud hut to the ground!" He points at the Whirling-in-Rags...

fields.Title: You: "(Conclude.) "Your colonel did not d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Conclude.) "Your colonel did not deserve to go out like that. I promise -- I *will* find his killer."
fields.Alternate1: (Conclude.) "Your brother did not deserve to go out like that. I promise -- I *will* find his killer."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Same fucking mudhut town too..." h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Same fucking mudhut town too..." he looks around, then wipes his face with his armoured glove.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Told us WHAT?!" He staggers forwar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Told us WHAT?!" He staggers forward. "What did you say? Who said that? Tattoo-fuck -- you'll die FIRST."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Yeah, I don't fucking *act* so wel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I don't fucking *act* so well. Lely had a hard-on for making faces for you natives. Fucking food-aid shit..." He wipes his mouth. "That shit is done now. Trigger time."

fields.Title: You: ""Raul and Ellis Kortenaer..." Look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Raul and Ellis Kortenaer..." Look him in the eye. "I'm sorry about your brother, Raul."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""They fucking put Lely in a leaf co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They fucking put Lely in a leaf compactor and now these cunts finished the job..." He waves at the gang huddled by the doors.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He was a good commander. I can see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was a good commander. I can see you miss him."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You don't fucking TALK TO ME about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't fucking TALK TO ME about my brother, loincloth!" He squeezes the words out from between clamped lips, his hand on the pistol...

fields.Title: You: "I should talk to him about the hang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should talk to him about the hanged man.

fields.Title: De Paule: ""Ready to open fire, major. At your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ready to open fire, major. At your command."

fields.Title: Endurance: "This one isn't used to being suited..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one isn't used to being suited this long. She's uncomfortable; will open fire just to hurry things along.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Of course! Nothing bad will happen...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course! Nothing bad will happen. Talk about his dead friend! He seems stable enough to take it.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""He wasn't my fucking brother! We j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He wasn't my fucking brother! We just grew up on the same farm and got beat into place by the same sick fuck..."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""If Lely was here, he would spare t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If Lely was here, he would spare the lot of you. Maybe shoot one for show. But me..." He points to himself. "I'm not a big fan of public affairs, clay-monkey. I'll gun every one of you down for what you did."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You don't *know* shit. Lance Corpo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't *know* shit. Lance Corporal, why don't you.." He turns to the radio officer on this right...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Told us WHAT?!" He staggers forwar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Told us WHAT?!" He staggers forward. "What did you say? Tattoo-fuck, you'll die NEXT. Right when the she-kipt's out..."

fields.Title: You: "Yes, go on. I don't want to do anyt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, go on. I don't want to do anything but say that thing down there.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Dangerous! Ask about him first. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dangerous! Ask about him first. You don't want personal facts about his dead friend coming out of your mouth -- *he* has to start it.

fields.Title: You: ""And then went to the same military..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And then went to the same military academy. And the same unit. And the same war..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We researched him. We contacted th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We researched him. We contacted the ICP and looked at his birth records. That was in there. And other things..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "There's real anguish in his voice...."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's real anguish in his voice. A drunken sadness suddenly engulfs him. Memories...

fields.Title: You: ""He had blue eyes didn't he -- your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He had blue eyes didn't he -- your colonel."
fields.Alternate1: "He had blue eyes didn't he -- your brother."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Big talk, but you got him to admit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Big talk, but you got him to admit he's a bad leader. It's a small thing -- but it got him off centre...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Our colonel did what he had to do...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Our colonel did what he had to do. It was either one cunt, or a hundred of them. Ruud here..." He points to him.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""I know what this tactic is, Silo S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what this tactic is, Silo Sam." He stares at you, eyes pink from the alcohol -- fingers tapping the pistol. "You're gonna die for them. Right here. Today."

fields.Title: You: ""I feel like I got to know your dea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel like I got to know your dead friend. During our investigation."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You don't fucking TALK TO ME about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't fucking TALK TO ME about my brother, loincloth!" He squeezes the words out from between clamped lips, his hand on the pistol...

fields.Title: Logic: "Korty -- Kortenaer. Major Raul *Kor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Korty -- Kortenaer. Major Raul *Korty* Kortenaer. Friends with Lely. Raul and Lely.

fields.Title: You: ""Listen, your Lely -- everyone says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, your Lely -- everyone says good things about him. He was a talker."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Baby blue, yeah... Like someone fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Baby blue, yeah... Like someone fucked up and put a baby's eyes on a grown man." He smiles, pulling his face in a strange way.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Ever better! It will further destab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ever better! It will further destabilize him -- costing time and maybe even lives!

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Don't let him finish the sentence!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let him finish the sentence!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Big talk, but that leaf compactor w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Big talk, but that leaf compactor won't leave his mind any time soon. It's a small thing -- but it got him off centre...

fields.Title: You: ""I knew you weren't a god damn scab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knew you weren't a god damn scab leader!"

fields.Title: Half Light: "This did nothing. You think you wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This did nothing. You think you were on to something?! You *just* wasted time... please, act.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Okay. Good."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. Good.

fields.Title: Logic: "...click, click, click! The realiza..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...click, click, click! The realization comes to you, like a picture puzzle coming together: His name is Raul Kortenaer -- the dead man's name is Ellis Kortenaer. He's *brothers* with the deceased!

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Who... Lely?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who... Lely?"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""...fucking murdered him. Had him s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...fucking murdered him. Had him stink the village up for two weeks after. And you fucks did nothing." He points at you.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Find his killer?! Cop, his killer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Find his killer?! Cop, his killer stands right there!" He waves at the men behind you. "Shitting his pants -- and *you're* standing in the way protecting them."

fields.Title: You: ""Kortenaer -- I know that name.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kortenaer -- I know that name."

fields.Title: You: ""You were foster brothers. I know t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were foster brothers. I know that."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. When he was small... just an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. When he was small... just an infant."

fields.Title: Logic: "The man he's mourning was called El..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man he's mourning was called Ellis *Kortenaer*. Korty could be short for Kortenaer? Could they be brothers? Ask him that. What could go wrong. It's a discovery!

fields.Title: Half Light: "Beaten by a foster parent, or someo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beaten by a foster parent, or someone on the farm?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've heard testimony. People say..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've heard testimony. People say he was charismatic. A nice guy to be around."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Yeah, he liked to chat up the nati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, he liked to chat up the natives. Share leaflets, squeeze a bit of kipt ass here and there. Great fucking idea that turned out to be..." He points toward the yard.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""He likes to fire mortars at random..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He likes to fire mortars at random coordinates. Wipe out mud-huts like that. When he gets *bored*. Lely knew how to command."

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""... in your shit-pipes, right..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... in your shit-pipes, right..." Indecipherable mumbling.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Find his killer?! Cop, his killers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Find his killer?! Cop, his killers stand right there!" He waves at the men behind you. "Shitting their pants -- and *you're* standing in the way protecting them."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "...and then he bellows: "For killin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and then he bellows: "For killing, maiming and humiliating our commanding officer -- you're all sentenced to death by lead!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "And if not -- lives aren't *that* i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And if not -- lives aren't *that* important anyway (including yours). There are billions of them, being lived.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Okay, yes. Immediate failure. Thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, yes. Immediate failure. Things are worse now. He's observing your every motion carefully...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "He sways from left to right, inspec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sways from left to right, inspecting you.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "...open fire -- we can't have that...."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...open fire -- we can't have that. Interfere, now!

fields.Title: You: ""Hey... I don't mean to pry but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey... I don't mean to pry but the hanged man -- was he your brother?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes. This will be good. It will cal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. This will be good. It will calm him down and won't cost any lives. Lives that could have been otherwise spared.

fields.Title: The Gardener: ""They... they didn't..." The woman..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They... they didn't..." The woman holds on to her side, teeth rattling.

fields.Title: You: "He doesn't seem stable at all...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't seem stable at all....
fields.Alternate1: Am I sure? He's already shot one person...
